activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11413
activity.text:
Solution:

I have reproduced similar UI elements tailwind for the mobile devices to remove the problem of horizontal scrolling that existed, I have also added the similar UI for Symptoms Card / Table to match the UI with Diagnoses Card / Table and Allergies Card / Table , you can have a look at the implementation below : 


https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f6d125ea-52aa-47bf-a5e5-9d57bac6f9ee

Expected Deadline : Immediately after being assigned the Pull Request

Also let me know if any additional change in UI of these card Is required

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11450
activity.text:
Solution: 
There is a read - only property associated to this element , removing it would solve the issue . You can see the highlighted part of the code which requires change: 
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a5531dec-cc6d-46dc-8311-49ef09da5acf)

Expected Timeline:
Immediately after being assigned the Pull Request
